ai-patthana16.80:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.80:0.3_0: There are cooking and trusting vision, so it’s hard to see.
ai-patthana16.80:1.1_0: You should give up improper attention to seeing. Truly knowing and seeing the Truths, the desire and the underlying tendencies. There’s no cause or condition for the sake of seeing.
ai-patthana16.80:2.1_0: Not taking up a cause of desire and lust, nor should it be given up. Completely Understanding of the Teaching, the Monastic Law, and the Teacher’s instruction. It should not be given up.
